title: Add fuzzy filter and remap keybindings behind Ctrl
description:
Rework keybindings to enable fuzzy filtering by typing letters directly.

## Current → New keybindings
- `j/k` → `Ctrl+j/k` (or arrows for navigation)
- `h/l` → `Ctrl+h/l` (or arrows for expand/collapse)
- `c` → `Ctrl+n` (create new session)
- `x` → `Ctrl+x` (kill)
- `y/n` confirmation → `Ctrl+y` to confirm, `Esc` to cancel

## New behavior
- Typing letters filters the session list (fuzzy match)
- `Esc` clears filter (or quits if no filter)
- `q` or `Ctrl+c` quits
- Number keys `1-9` still jump to sessions
- `Enter` selects filtered result

## Benefits
- Faster session switching with many sessions
- More intuitive vim-like feel (always-on search)

title: Bubbletea TUI Rewrite
description: Rewrite tmux-session-picker from bash/fzf to Go/Bubbletea TUI. See docs/plans/2025-01-04-bubbletea-tui-design.md for full design.
close_reason: Bubbletea TUI rewrite completed and merged to main

title: Initialize Go module and project structure
description: Set up go.mod, create directory structure (cmd/tsp, internal/model, internal/tmux, internal/claude, internal/ui), add bubbletea/lipgloss/bubbles dependencies.

title: Implement switch action (enter)
description: Add enter key to switch to selected session or window. Call tmux switch-client. Exit TUI after switch.

title: Add transient message system
description: Implement message line with auto-clear after ~2 seconds. Show feedback after actions (switched, killed, created). Show errors in different color.

title: Create Makefile and install script
description: Add Makefile with build, install, clean targets. Binary name: tsp. Install location: ~/.local/bin/. Update install.sh to build Go binary instead of symlinking bash script.

title: Implement tmux command wrappers
description: Create internal/tmux/tmux.go with functions: ListSessions(), ListWindows(session), KillSession(name), KillWindow(session, index), CreateSession(name, dir), SwitchClient(target). Handle parsing tmux output.

title: Implement Claude status reader
description: Create internal/claude/status.go to read ~/.cache/tmux-session-picker/*.status files. Parse state (new/working/waiting) and timestamp. Handle missing files gracefully.

title: Create base model and view structure
description: Implement internal/model/model.go with App struct, Mode enum, Session/Window types. Set up basic bubbletea Init/Update/View lifecycle. Render static list without interactions.

title: Implement lipgloss styles
description: Create internal/ui/styles.go with styles for: selected row, normal row, expanded indicator, collapsed indicator, window row, Claude status colors (new/working/waiting), header, footer, message line.

title: Implement navigation (j/k/h/l)
description: Add key handling for j/k navigation through flattened list, h to collapse, l to expand. Handle cursor bounds. Auto-collapse other sessions when expanding.

title: Implement number jump (1-9)
description: Add 1-9 key handling. When in normal view, jump to session by position. When inside expanded session, switch directly to window. Handle edge case of >9 sessions.

title: Implement kill flow (x/xx)
description: Add kill functionality: single x shows confirmation in message line, double xx kills instantly. Handle ModeConfirmKill state. Re-fetch sessions after kill. Show feedback message.

title: Implement create session flow (c)
description: Add create functionality: c opens text input in message line, enter creates session and applies layout, esc cancels. Use bubbles textinput component. Validate session name.

title: Add directory picker for new sessions
description:
Similar to `repos open` - pick a directory to create a new tmux session from.

## Feature
When creating a new session, add option to browse directories and create session from selected path.

## Implementation
Use Bubbletea ecosystem tools:
- bubbles/filepicker or similar for directory browsing
- Session naming from directory path (like repos does)
- Layout application from config

## Config options needed
- `repos_base_path` - Base directory to search
- `tmux_layout` / `tmux_layouts_dir` - Layout settings

## Depends on
- Config file support (for repos_base_path, layout settings)

title: Pick a new project name
description:
The project needs a new name now that it's a Go TUI instead of a bash/fzf script.

## Considerations
- Short and memorable
- Available on GitHub
- Reflects tmux session management
- Binary name should be easy to type

## Current names
- Repo: tmux-session-picker
- Binary: tsp

## Ideas to explore
- Keep `tsp` as binary name?
- Something with "switch", "hop", "jump"?
